alert.note: Alert for Southern Wayne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 7:09PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Wayne and west central Pike Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 709 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Blooming Grove, or 14 miles south of Honesdale, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blooming Grove, Paupack, Ledgerdale, Pecks Pond, Promised Land State Park and Lords Valley. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 84 between 20 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
